definition: the taste experience when a savoury condiment is taken into the mouth, lend flavor to
details:
noun
- the taste experience when a savoury condiment is taken into the mouth
= synonyms: nip
- in physics, the six types of either quarks or leptons
= example: in physics, the six types of either quarks or leptons
= synonyms: flavor
- the general atmosphere of a place or situation and the effect that it has on people
= synonyms: feeling
verb
- lend flavor to
= synonyms: flavor
